revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Summary of the quaestors from the tax-polls made in the 16th year of Hadrian Caesar, the lord, which had been recorded some time ago by P- and Maron, [l. 5] former metropolitan secretaries. Following other entries in columns 146 and 147. Subjoined are names of those registered as metropolitans until the 15th year of Hadrian Caesar, the lord, reported in the [l. 10] memoranda of Andromachos, strategos of Polemon, as unable to prove their personal status (when they claimed that they had been wrongly assessed) for village taxes by the secretary of the hamlet of [l. 15] Pterophoros from the 12th year of Hadrian, the lord, until that time. The names are as follows: . . . son of Ischyrion so of Diodoros . . .

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. III 124 BL III, 151; IV, 71; ZPE 106 (1993) 194.
